title: Development of Design-Based Thinking Pedagogy for Artificial Intelligence Education

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of fundamental programming concepts and general understanding of technical education
context.additional_context: Environment promoting design-based thinking activities by combining face-to-face workshops with online collaboration platforms

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles and societal impact of artificial intelligence systems.
Learners can develop AI educational activity plans by utilizing a design-based thinking process.
Learners can visually represent AI educational design proposals using collaboration tools and incorporate feedback.
Learners can develop AI educational scenarios that reflect ethical considerations.

resources: Case Study Materials (Including Social Impact Cases)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
